# Office Mayhem Simulator - Comedy Game Project

This is a browser-based comedy game that's both playable online and installable as a PWA.

## Project Status

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold the game project structure
- [x] Create game files with comedy mechanics
- [x] Add PWA functionality (manifest, service worker)
- [ ] Test and launch the game

## Project Structure
- HTML5 Canvas-based game
- PWA with offline capabilities
- Installable on desktop and mobile
- Local storage for high scores
